    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JetViewSplitTable

    public class JetSplitTable<E extends Reflection>
extends JetTable<E>
    A JetTable implementation that has a fixed header. It does not use the extended FlexTable but rather use two FlexTables, one for the header and one for the content.
    Author:
    fpugnali
